name: What's under the snow?
description:
Hello my dear friend!

How about a little help for early sunlight?
He wants to find as many objects hidden under the snow as possible. To find out what kind of object you need to shine on it and wait until the snow melts on it.
But other rays are also in a hurry to appear. We must be in time, see as many objects as possible while they are not there. We only have 120 seconds.

Control only by mouse.
